snippet: David Carr and Jenna Wortham discuss the Facebook initial public offering, and how all the focus on profits and stock price complicates the company's relationship with its users.
abstract: David Carr and Jenna Wortham discuss the Facebook initial public offering, and how all the focus on profits and stock price complicates the company's relationship with its users.

headline.main: David Carr and Jenna Wortham Discuss Facebook's Prospects in Video
